discussion.p: Move assignment is going in the wrong direction, assigning from *this to the passed rvalue, and then returning a reference to an unusable *this.
discussion.blockquote: We recommend deferring this issue until after Detlef's paper (on futures) has been issued.

p.del: -6- Effects: move assigns its associated state to rhs.

blockquote.p: -7- Postcondition: *this has no associated state. associated state of *this is the same as the associated state of rhs before the call. rhs has no associated state.
